content.raw: Just checking that the `newSize` variable is correct. Afeter the `for` loop below, `newSize` will have the size of the last collision object. This size is then used to compute inertia values. Do we want the size of the last collision object, the sum of all collision objects, the largest collision object, the bounding box of all collision objects?
